BearerAuth.description: Enter JWT token in the format 'Bearer <token>'

get.summary: Retrieves a list of reagents with metadata for available pages
get.description: Retrieve a list of available reagents.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A search query to filter by name, description, etc.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The sort order, either 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending. Default is 'asc'.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page. Max is 100. Default is 10.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The field by which the results should be sorted. Default is 'name'.

parameters.name: searchBy
parameters.description: Fields to search by. Can be a single value or an array of values.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter reagents by category, such as 'sample' or 'reagent'.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter reagents by status. Options include 'available', 'lowStock', 'outOfStock', 'ordered', or 'notAvailable'.

parameters.name: storageLocation
parameters.description: Filter reagents by their storage location.

post.summary: Creates new reagent in the system

500.description: Server Error - Could not create reagent.

get.summary: Retrieves a specific reagent by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Reagent UUID.

404.description: The requested reagent was not found.

put.summary: Updates an existing reagent by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Reagent UUID.

404.description: The requested reagent was not found.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Reagent UUID.

404.description: The requested reagent was not found.

patch.summary: Reverts the soft delete of a reagent by id
patch.description: Revert soft delete reagent by id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Reagent UUID.

404.description: The requested reagent was not found.

get.summary: Retrieves available storage locations with metadata for available pages

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A search query to filter by name, description, etc.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The sort order, either 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending. Default is 'asc'.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page. Max is 100. Default is 10.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The field to sort results by. Default is 'name'.

parameters.name: searchBy
parameters.description: Specific fields to search within. Can be a single field or an array of fields.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: Filter results by room name or identifier.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter results by the name of the storage location.

message.default: No Authorization was found in request.headers
No Authorization was found in request.headers

get.description: Retrieve a specific storage location by id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Storage location UUID.

message.default: No Authorization was found in request.headers

200.description: Storage location data with nullified 'deletedAt' field.

get.summary: Retrieves all orders with metadata for available pages

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A search query to filter by name, description, etc.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The sort order, either 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending. Default is 'asc'.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page. Max is 100. Default is 10.

get.summary: Retrieves a single order by its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Order UUID.
